title: S2E8 Brad Thomas - Rocker, Ranger, and SMU Commando
description:
Brad Thomas is one of those people you can’t put into a box. He’s an Army Ranger who fought in Gothic Serpent (aka Black Hawk Down), became an SMU Commando, and now makes music alongside other SOF veterans in the band Silence and Light. SOFcast hosts CCM Greg Smith and SGM Matt Parrish talked with Brad about his experience in SOF, finding his tribe, and how music connects him to fellow veterans.

Don’t forget to subscribe and follow us on social media and YouTube.
itunes:author: US Special Operations Command
